ai-tha-ap62:1.2_0: I saw the benefit of the world,
ai-tha-ap62:1.4_0: I came to the supreme city.
ai-tha-ap62:2.1_0: I will give the Fortunate One’s Dhamma
ai-tha-ap62:2.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap62:3.1_0: Because of neither what is non-violent.
ai-tha-ap62:3.2_0: the foot-stands for defecating the feet;
ai-tha-ap62:4.1_0: Seeing a flower belly with the top,
ai-tha-ap62:5.3_0: sat down on the Community of monks.
ai-tha-ap62:6.3_0: I shall extol the darkness with you,
ai-tha-ap62:6.4_0: Listen to me, I will speak.
ai-tha-ap62:7.4_0: wheel-turning monarch will be successful in the Universal Monarch.
ai-tha-ap62:8.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap62:8.3_0: After rejoicing the two offerings together:
ai-tha-ap62:8.4_0: you’ll delight in a human state.
ai-tha-ap62:11.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap62:11.2_0: I am the one intent on awakening.
ai-tha-ap62:11.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap62:11.4_0: this is the plane of Awakening.
ai-tha-ap62:13.1_0: and seven eons have been stored up,
ai-tha-ap62:13.3_0: it thoroughly goes to the top of the stream,
ai-tha-ap62:14.1_0: if he enters upon the twenty eons;
ai-tha-ap62:16.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Bodhi.
ai-tha-ap62:17.1_0: having unsurpassed the Elder Nun Bodhi
ai-tha-ap62:18.1_0: The sixth sub-chapter on seeds is finished.
ai-tha-ap62:20.1_0: the seeds are better and fine;
ai-tha-ap62:20.5_0: The One of Ten Awakened Ones
